meanings.definition: The quality or state of being grainy.
meanings.sent1: The graininess of the sandpaper made it perfect for smoothing the wood.
meanings.sent2: I don't like the graininess of this sugar in my coffee.
meanings.sent3: The graininess of the ice cream surprised me, but it added a fun texture.
meanings.sent4: The graininess of the photograph gave it a vintage feel.
meanings.sent5: The graininess of the bread made it feel homemade and comforting.

meanings.definition: The presence of small, granular particles.
meanings.sent1: The graininess of the soil made it ideal for planting seeds.
meanings.sent2: The graininess of the salt added flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't believe the graininess of the paint - it was like painting with sand!
meanings.sent4: The graininess of the snow made the landscape sparkle like diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The graininess of the lotion helped exfoliate my skin gently.
